title: I need to renewal my license can I fill the form by online? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m in the UK and can renew my driving licence online very easily - and have done. I can also renew my TV licence online, and probably many other types of licence too… But I have no idea where you are, nor what sort of licence you are talking about. The answer for you is likely to vary considerably depending on your location and what sort of licence you are talking about. Maybe you’d be better to ask whatever licencing authority handles your licence renewal - they will be able to give you an accurate answer.
